mapper.update:
update teacher
teacher_number = #{teacher_number},
teacher_name = #{teacherName},
teacher_school = #{teacherSchool},
teacher_title = #{teacherTitle},
teacher_email = #{teacherEmail},
teacher_password = #{teacherPassword},
and id = #{id}
and 1 != 1
mapper.insert: insert into teacher(teacher_name, teacher_number, teacher_school, teacher_email, teacher_password, teacher_title) values (#{teacherName}, #{teacherNumber}, #{teacherSchool}, #{teacherEmail}, #{teacherPassword}, #{teacherTitle})
mapper.select: SELECT teacher.* FROM teacher inner join ( SELECT id, teacher_name as search_key FROM teacher WHERE teacher.teacher_name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{key}), '%') UNION SELECT id, teacher_number as search_key FROM teacher where teacher.teacher_number like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{key}), '%')) temp on teacher.id = temp.id order by length(temp.search_key);
